LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.label: steel slag chunk
LanguageData.ChunkSlagSteel.description: A chunk of steel slag. While it's useless in its current form, it can be smelted to recover steel.
LanguageData.ChunkSlagSterile.label: sterile slag chunk
LanguageData.ChunkSlagSterile.description: A chunk of slag that appears to be from a sterile compartment of a ship. While it's useless in its current form, it can be smelted to recover silver and steel.
LanguageData.ChunkSlagGold.label: luxury slag chunk
LanguageData.ChunkSlagGold.description: A chunk of slag that appears to be from some luxury compartment of a ship. While it's useless in its current form, it can be smelted to recover gold and steel.
LanguageData.ChunkSlagPlasteel.label: plasteel slag chunk
LanguageData.ChunkSlagPlasteel.description: A chunk of plasteel slag. While it's useless in its current form, it can be smelted to recover plasteel.
